content.query:
CREATE PROCEDURE CreateNATOSentimentTable
AS
BEGIN
    CREATE TABLE [Sent].[NATO_Sentiment]
(
    [Sentiment] NVARCHAR(10) NULL,
    [Count] INT NULL,
    [Confidence Score Negative] REAL NULL,
    [Confidence Score Positive] REAL NULL,
    [Confidence Score Neutral] REAL NULL,
    [Confidence Score Mixed] REAL NULL
);
END;
